document.discussion_title: Censor.net: Myrotvorets reveals info on 4,500 mercenaries fighting in Ukraine
document.topic_text: Ukraine Russia ATO Donbas mercenaries Aug. 22, 2016 11:02 215 159 Share Tweet A group of Russian mercenaries in Ukraine who volunteered to go to war through the Sverdlovsk special forces veterans union. Photo by Ekaterinburg Online Myrotvorets website has published personal data of more than 4,500 mercenaries recruited to take part in the war on the territory of Ukraine. People's Front MP Anton Herashchenko wrote on Facebook, Censor.NET reports.
